about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Welcome. I am really glad you are here.
about.paragraph2: Looking for mental health care can feel overwhelming, and just being here is an important first step. My practice is grounded in compassion, respect, and genuine connection. I believe care should feel safe, supportive, and tailored to you as a whole person.
about.paragraph3: As a board certified Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner, I take time to listen and understand your story, your concerns, and your goals. Whether you are feeling anxious, overwhelmed, stuck, or simply seeking clarity and support, you do not have to navigate it alone.
about.paragraph4: It would be an honor to support you on your journey toward healing and balance.

education.title: Education
education.msn: Master of Science in Nursing – Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner, Saint Louis University (December 2025)
education.bsn: Bachelor of Science in Nursing, Northeastern State University (2021)
education.adn: Associate Degree in Nursing, Tulsa Community College (2016)

services.title: Services
services.evaluationsDesc: DSM-5-TR diagnostic assessments across the lifespan
services.medicationDesc: Initiation, titration, and monitoring of psychiatric medications
services.riskDesc: Suicide and violence risk assessments with safety planning
services.crisisDesc: Immediate support and intervention during mental health crises
services.bilingualDesc: Services available in English and Spanish
services.therapyDesc: CBT, Supportive Psychotherapy, Motivational Interviewing, Trauma-Informed Care, Psychoeducation
services.coordinationDesc: Collaboration with therapists and other healthcare providers
